roleset.name: rest
roleset.note: LANGUISH-V NOTES: Frames file for 'languish' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. Verbnet entry exist-47.1-1. (from languish.01-v)

example.name: stock prices, natch
example.text: The share price was languishing at about 400 pence before Ford's Sept. 19 announcement of its interest in a minority stake.
example.arg: before Ford's Sept. 19 announcement of its interest in a minority stake

roleset.name: crave
roleset.note: LANGUISH-V NOTES: I think I've read this sense before. Maybe. (from languish.02-v)

example.name: poor John
example.text: John was languishing for a peanut butter and pickle sandwich.
example.arg: for a peanut butter and pickle sandwich
